Package hu.bme.mit.theta.frontend.transformation.model.types.simple

Class CSimpleType

java.lang.Object
hu.bme.mit.theta.frontend.transformation.model.types.simple.CSimpleType
Direct Known Subclasses:
Atomic, DeclaredName, Enum, Extern, NamedType, Signed, ThreadLocal, Typedef, Unsigned, Volatile
public abstract class CSimpleType extends Object
Any received CType instance will either be a NamedType or an Enum (and later a Struct, still under development). The other subclasses are helper classes to provide metadata on the signedness, atomicity, etc. of the type.

    • getBaseType

      public CSimpleType getBaseType()
      Returns the base type of the C type e.g. `int* a` will result in a CType of int pointer but the semantic meaning is that it is an int and the declared variable is of pointer type (this is a shortcoming of the grammar)
      Returns:
      base type
